summary: A small farmhouse on the shores of Lake Ilinalta.
descriptionHtml:
Nothing fancy, just a nice quiet retreat for those who enjoy a slower pace of life away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Built on the shores of the beautiful Lake Ilinalta near Riverwood. A perfect setting for relaxing strolls in the woods collecting ingredients.

The exterior has:

Leather Tanner
Grindstone
Forge
Workbench
Woodchopping block
Chicken run with 2 nests and 3 chickens
Pontoon with fishing boat
Small garden with leeks cabbages and potatoes 
Large butterfly/bug spawn on one side of the house
Large bee spawn with beehive on other side of the house
Outdoor seating with lovely views of the lake
Lots of food/fish barrels and sacks

The interior has:

Bed
Large hearth with cooking pot
Alchemy station
Enchanting station
3 weapon plaques
2 weapon racks
3 large bookcases
Mannequin
Lots of storage

Interior and exterior fully navmeshed

The bed gives the fully rested bonus, however it does not give the message informing you of such. Just check your active effects.

All interior storage is safe, however do not store items in the exterior barrels etc.

The house will show up on your map and does not need to be discovered, you can move in as soon as you start.

Enjoy


NOTE: Some people have issue with floating grass. It\'s a known bug with the Creation Kit. To fix it:

Go to your documents/my games/skyrim Open up both Skyrim.ini AND SkyrimPrefs.ini and at the bottom of the [Grass] section add/alter this:

bAllowLoadGrass=0
bAllowCreateGrass=1
bDrawShaderGrass=1

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Update 1.65

Fixed an issue with one of the bookcases (Books were loading from right to left)

Update 1.6

Fixed flickering lights
Rearranged some furniture to give better access to bookcases
Rearranged some minor clutter
author: Brilhasti
